org.kj.pxe.protocol

Interface DhcpPacket

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DhcpAckPacket, DhcpDiscoverPacket, DhcpOfferPacket, DhcpRequestPacket
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DhcpPacketImpl, DhcpRequestPacketImpl

    public interface DhcpPacket
    Contains getters and setters for all the data fields in a DHCP Packet.
